title: Vapour
description: Justin Waters has ASD and ADHD. His parents helped him by helping him prepare flowcharts and different scenarios so he would be able to navigate his world. When he reads his father's eReader he connects with the stories concerning the apocalypse and the need for people to be prepared. He starts making all sorts of plans and is one of the few who is ready for what is coming.  NOTE: This is only 20,000 words. That's about 100 kindle pages. The next episode is due out October 1, 2019. it will be about the same size.
author: Ethan Stand
